title: Telekinesis Beats Himself Up
teaser: Michael Benjamin Lerner, the rock musician also known as Telekinesis, beats himself up for a laugh. Telekinesis’ new album Dormarion is out this week.
contentencoded: Michael Benjamin Lerner, the rock musician also known as Telekinesis, beats himself up for a laugh. Telekinesis’ new album Dormarion is out this week.
